entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
